column2: Tell me a joke about narrators.
column3: [me narrating a documentary about narrators] "I can't hear what they're saying cuz I'm talking"
column4: Why did the narrator go to therapy? Because he kept getting stuck in the same plot holes!

column2: Tell me a joke about the benefits of garlic.
column3: Telling my daughter garlic is good for you. Good immune system and keeps pests away.Ticks, mosquitos, vampires... men.
column4: Why did the garlic refuse to share its benefits? Because it didn't want to take any "vamp"ires!

column2: Tell me a joke about a workplace mishap.
column3: I've been going through a really rough period at work this week It's my own fault for swapping my tampax for sand paper.
column4: Why did the office chair break? Because it couldn't handle the pressure of being the boss's favorite seat!

column2: Tell me a witty joke about choosing dinner companions.
column3: If I could have dinner with anyone, dead or alive... ...I would choose alive. -B.J. Novak-
column4: Why did the picky eater bring a mirror to dinner? To make sure they were surrounded by the most interesting person in the room!

column2: Come up with a prompt for a joke involving a surprising twist.
column3: Two guys walk into a bar. The third guy ducks.
column4: Why did the office chair break? Because it couldn't handle the pressure of being the boss's favorite seat!

column2: Tell me a joke about Barbie and Ken.
column3: Why can't Barbie get pregnant? Because Ken comes in a different box. Heyooooooo
column4: Why did Barbie break up with Ken? Because he was always too plastic about their relationship!

column2: Tell me a joke about a musician getting into trouble.
column3: Why was the musician arrested? He got in treble.
column4: Why did the musician end up in trouble? Because he couldn't handle the treble of life and kept getting into bass situations!

column2: Tell me a joke about someone spending their money foolishly.
column3: Did you hear about the guy who blew his entire lottery winnings on a limousine? He had nothing left to chauffeur it.
column4: Why did the person spend all their money on origami paper? Because they heard it was a great way to fold their savings!

column2: Tell me a joke about dealing with an unexpected situation.
column3: What do you do if a bird shits on your car? Don't ask her out again.
column4: How do you deal with an unexpected situation? You just improvise, adapt, and pretend you meant for that to happen all along!

column2: Tell me a joke about chivalry.
column3: He was a real gentlemen and always opened the fridge door for me
column4: Why did the knight bring a ladder to the castle? Because he heard chivalry was dead, so he was trying to scale new heights to save it!

column2: Tell me a joke about a parent giving unusual advice to their child.
column3: Telling my daugthers date that "she has lice and its very contagious the closer you get to her." *Correct way to parent.
column4: Why did the parent tell their child to always carry a spoon? Because you never know when you might need to "stir" up some trouble!
